text: Benjamin Hoskins Paddock Jr. was an American bank robber and con man who was on the FBI's Ten Most Wanted Fugitives from 1969 to 1977. He was the father of the 2017 Las Vegas shooting suspect Stephen Paddock, but never knew him. Category:1926 births Category:1998 deaths Category:American robbers Category:American fraudsters Category:People from Sheboygan, Wisconsin
title: Benjamin Hoskins Paddock
